title: UPDATED "50 STATES OF RECYCLING" ASSESSMENT FINDS THAT WELL-DESIGNED POLICY IS CRITICAL TO ... - PR Newswire
summary: The '50 States of Recycling' report emphasizes the importance of accurate data, policies, and infrastructure investment to enhance recycling rates across the United States, highlighting the benefits of recycling refunds and Extended Producer Responsibility (EPR). The report reveals disparities in recycling rates among states, and the potential economic and environmental gains from improving recycling practices nationally.
